verses.text: \w From|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, \w purple|strong="H8504"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* \w yarn|strong="H8144"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* specially \w woven|strong="H8278"\w* garments \w for|strong="H6213"\w* ministry \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, \w as|strong="H6213"\w* well \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* garments \w for|strong="H6213"\w* Aaron, \w just|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

Bezalel \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* ephod \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w finely|strong="H8336"\w* spun \w linen|strong="H8336"\w* embroidered \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, \w purple|strong="H8504"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* \w yarn|strong="H8144"\w*.

\w They|strong="H6213"\w* \w hammered|strong="H7554"\w* \w out|strong="H6213"\w* thin \w sheets|strong="H6341"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w cut|strong="H7112"\w* \w threads|strong="H6616"\w* \w from|strong="H2091"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* interweave \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, \w purple|strong="H8504"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* \w yarn|strong="H8144"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*—\w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* skilled craftsman.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w* \w pieces|strong="H3802"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ephod, which \w were|strong="H8147"\w* \w attached|strong="H2266"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* corners, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* could be fastened.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w skillfully|strong="H2805"\w* \w woven|strong="H2805"\w* waistband \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ephod \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H4480"\w* piece \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ephod, \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w workmanship|strong="H4639"\w*—\w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, \w purple|strong="H8504"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* \w yarn|strong="H8144"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w finely|strong="H8336"\w* spun \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, just \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* mounted \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w onyx|strong="H7718"\w* stones \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w filigree|strong="H4865"\w* \w settings|strong="H4142"\w*, \w engraved|strong="H6605"\w* \w like|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w seal|strong="H2368"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4872"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* fastened \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w* \w pieces|strong="H3802"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ephod \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* stones \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w breastpiece|strong="H2833"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* same \w workmanship|strong="H4639"\w* \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* ephod, \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, \w purple|strong="H8504"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* \w yarn|strong="H8144"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w finely|strong="H8336"\w* spun \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*.

\w It|strong="H6213"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w square|strong="H7251"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w folded|strong="H3717"\w* \w over|strong="H7341"\w* \w double|strong="H3717"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w span|strong="H2239"\w* long \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w span|strong="H2239"\w* \w wide|strong="H7341"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4390"\w* they \w mounted|strong="H4390"\w* on it four \w rows|strong="H2905"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* gemstones: \w The|strong="H4390"\w* first \w row|strong="H2905"\w* had \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ruby, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w topaz|strong="H6357"\w*, \w and|strong="H4390"\w* \w an|strong="H4390"\w* \w emerald|strong="H1304"\w*;

\w the|strong="H8145"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w row|strong="H2905"\w* had \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w turquoise|strong="H5306"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sapphire|strong="H5601"\w*, \w and|strong="H8145"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w diamond|strong="H3095"\w*;

\w the|strong="H7992"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w row|strong="H2905"\w* had \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w jacinth|strong="H3958"\w*, an \w agate|strong="H7618"\w*, \w and|strong="H7992"\w* an amethyst;

\w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w the|strong="H7243"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w row|strong="H2905"\w* had \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w beryl|strong="H8658"\w*, \w an|strong="H2091"\w* \w onyx|strong="H7718"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w jasper|strong="H3471"\w*. These stones were \w mounted|strong="H4396"\w* \w in|strong="H4142"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w filigree|strong="H4865"\w* \w settings|strong="H4142"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* stones corresponded \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w Each|strong="H8147"\w* stone \w was|strong="H8034"\w* engraved \w like|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w seal|strong="H2368"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w breastpiece|strong="H2833"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w braided|strong="H4639"\w* \w chains|strong="H8333"\w* \w like|strong="H6213"\w* \w cords|strong="H5688"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5414"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w fastened|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w chains|strong="H5688"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w corners|strong="H7098"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w breastpiece|strong="H2833"\w*,

\w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w fastened|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w other|strong="H8147"\w* \w ends|strong="H7098"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w chains|strong="H5688"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w filigree|strong="H4865"\w* \w settings|strong="H4865"\w*, attaching \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w* \w pieces|strong="H3802"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ephod \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w front|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w more|strong="H2091"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w attached|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w other|strong="H5676"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w corners|strong="H7098"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w breastpiece|strong="H2833"\w*, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w inside|strong="H1004"\w* \w edge|strong="H8193"\w* \w next|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ephod.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* additional \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w attached|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w bottom|strong="H4295"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w* \w pieces|strong="H3802"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ephod, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w front|strong="H6440"\w*, \w near|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* seam \w just|strong="H6213"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w woven|strong="H2805"\w* waistband.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w tied|strong="H6616"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w breastpiece|strong="H2833"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ephod \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w cord|strong="H6616"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w* yarn, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w breastpiece|strong="H2833"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* waistband \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ephod \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* swing \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ephod, just \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w They|strong="H6213"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w robe|strong="H4598"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* ephod \w entirely|strong="H3632"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w* cloth, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* weaver,

\w with|strong="H6310"\w* an \w opening|strong="H6310"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w center|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w robe|strong="H4598"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* garment, \w with|strong="H6310"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w collar|strong="H6310"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w opening|strong="H6310"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H8432"\w* would \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w tear|strong="H7167"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, \w purple|strong="H8504"\w*, \w and|strong="H8504"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* \w yarn|strong="H8144"\w* \w and|strong="H8504"\w* finely spun linen \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* lower \w hem|strong="H7757"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w robe|strong="H4598"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w also|strong="H6213"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w bells|strong="H6472"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w attached|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hem|strong="H7757"\w* \w between|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w*,

alternating \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bells|strong="H6472"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* lower \w hem|strong="H7757"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w robe|strong="H4598"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* worn \w for|strong="H5921"\w* ministry, just \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w For|strong="H6213"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w tunics|strong="H3801"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* weaver,

as well as \w the|strong="H6287"\w* \w turban|strong="H4701"\w* \w of|strong="H4701"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, \w the|strong="H6287"\w* ornate \w headbands|strong="H4021"\w* \w and|strong="H8336"\w* \w undergarments|strong="H4370"\w* \w of|strong="H4701"\w* \w finely|strong="H8336"\w* spun \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*,

\w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sash \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w finely|strong="H8336"\w* spun \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, embroidered \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, \w purple|strong="H8504"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* \w yarn|strong="H8144"\w*, just \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w plate|strong="H6731"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w crown|strong="H5145"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* engraved \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w like|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w inscription|strong="H6603"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w seal|strong="H2368"\w*: \w HOLY|strong="H6944"\w* \w TO|strong="H3068"\w* \w THE|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5414"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w fastened|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w* \w cord|strong="H6616"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* mount \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w turban|strong="H4701"\w*, just \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
